messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We are monitoring your comms. If you want a fighting ring please set it up in one area, we are happy to provide weapons.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Do you want any exotic weapons for your fighting ring?

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Send the cargo shuttle to centcomm and we will send it back with exotic weapons for your fighting ring

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The exotic weapons have been delivered, enjoy

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Please use the provided weapons responsibly, within the fighting ring you set up

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Please claim all the weapons from the cargo shuttle before we return them

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Research Director's Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Paperwork Mishap Alert

A recent bureaucratic error in the Organic Resources Department may result in personnel shortages in some departments and redundant staffing in others.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our omnipotence, we believe that one of the station's animals/bots has developed security level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Paperwork Mishap Alert

A recent bureaucratic error in the Organic Resources Department may result in personnel shortages in some departments and redundant staffing in others.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 2. Recommend station AI involvement.
